name: Bears in Tanks
description: Blow your friends away in this free-for-all brawl based on the tank games of the past! Cooperative play is optional.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1+, 8, 10, 64-bit versions only Processor: SSE2 instruction set support. Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Graphics card with DX10 (shader model 4.0) capabilities. Storage: 200 MB available space
